subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: In the area known locally as the Triangle, which includes the madly competitive college communities of Raleigh (N.C. State), Durham (Duke) and Chapel Hill (Tar Heels), Atlantic Coast Conference basketball rules, and all other sports are left to battle for runner-up status.
